indianajawns: i literally wrote this post today - they will make fun of you for being shy and quiet. they will make fun of your gap, your flat chest, and then your huge boobs. they will laugh at you for being a virgin at 18. they’ll say you think you’re better than them because you keep your circle small. they’ll hate you for being able to stand on your own while they fight to fit in. not because they are jealous – because they are weak. they will see your radical self acceptance as a threat. let them.
